title: “I support in enhancing long established UK-Sri Lanka relationships”, says new British Deputy HC in Colombo
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma New British Deputy High Commissioner to Sri Lanka Mr Robbie Bulloch said “I’m delighted to take up post as Deputy High Commissioner (DHC) in Colombo at a time of such great potential for Sri Lanka.  I look forward to supporting the High Commissioner and the rest of the team…
